post:
We are a web hosting company/datacenter located in Europe (Latvia). We offer fully managed cloud VPS from as low as $25/mo.

All we do: domain registration, web hosting, SSL certs etc. is 100% confidential - nobody will ever know who is the real owner of your server/domain.

We offer truly hi-end state-of-the-art cloud virtual private servers (VPS) based on Intel platform. Powerful Intel Xeon 5620 CPUs, ultra high speed FC/NFS cloud storages guarantee you exceptional performance and second-to-none reliability. No overselling or shared resources – VMware virtual machines make resource cheating impossible! All servers are fully managed and confidential.

Servers are fully managed - no Magnifico kind of installs - everything is done by a human specialist. We can install virtually anything - O/S, ERPs, CMSs, VoIP, mail servers, bug tracking software - you name it. All installs are FREE (included)! Forget about $150/hour service fees.

Xeon 5620 1 core, 256Mb RAM, 5Gb HDD RAID-DP cloud storage, 1gbit port/100mbit network, Centos 6.3 32/64bit (or Debian/Ubuntu/Fedora/FreeBSD), 1 clean IP, FREE SETUP, FULLY MANAGED @$25/mo.

Xeon 5620 1 core, 512Mb RAM, 10Gb HDD RAID-DP cloud storage, 1gbit port/100mbit network, Centos 6.3 32/64bit (or Debian/Ubuntu/Fedora/FreeBSD), 1 clean IP, FREE SETUP, FULLY MANAGED @$35/mo.

Xeon 5620 2 core, 1Gb RAM, 30Gb HDD RAID-DP cloud storage, 1gbit port/100mbit network, Centos 6.3 32/64bit (or Debian/Ubuntu/Fedora/FreeBSD), 1 clean IP, FREE SETUP, FULLY MANAGED @$55/mo.

Xeon 5620 2 core, 2Gb RAM, 50Gb HDD RAID-DP cloud storage, 1gbit port/100mbit network, Centos 6.3 32/64bit (or Debian/Ubuntu/Fedora/FreeBSD), 1 clean IP, FREE SETUP, FULLY MANAGED @$75/mo.

Xeon 5620 2 core, 4Gb RAM, 120Gb HDD RAID-DP cloud storage, 1gbit port/100mbit network, Centos 6.3 32/64bit (or Debian/Ubuntu/Fedora/FreeBSD), 1 clean IP, FREE SETUP, FULLY MANAGED @$99/mo.

We now accept paysafecard and Webmoney!

We have several free IP subnets (/27, /26, /24) for rent!

Please visit our websites: http://www.serveria.com and http://www.bighost.lv or PM me for a personalized quotation.
